title: Ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client library for Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Ollama Python client library with sync & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models (chat, embeddings, tools).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG).

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client for Ollama with fluent API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal chat UI with history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for generating code and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter template exposing Ollama REST endpoints with CORS and auth.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that wraps Ollama with session memory and RAG options.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Experimental Terraform provider to manage Ollama models as infrastructure.
